column4: after upgrade menu Add/Remove Application doesn't run how to fix it? if i run it from console it works.
the same thing is with compiz settings
why? what message does it gives?
open a terminal and type: sudo gnome-app-install
and tell me if there is any message
you seem to have some undefined symbol in cairo
sudo aptitude reinstall libcairo2 libcairomm-1.0-1 python-cairo
then update your system to latest version all packages by typing sudo aptitude update and then sudo aptitude dist-upgrade
ok, i'll try it but i have to go on my english classes ;]
